sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); // Simulate API call await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)); setIsSubmitting(false); setIsSubmitted(true); // Reset form after 3 seconds setTimeout(() => { setIsSubmitted(false); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); }, 3000); }; const contactInfo = [ { icon: ( ), title: 'Office Address', details: [ 'Kanoon Mitra Legal Services', '123 Legal Plaza, Connaught Place', 'New Delhi, Delhi 110001', 'India' ] }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Phone Numbers', details: [ '+91 11 2345 6789', '+91 98765 43210', 'Toll Free: 1800 123 4567' ] }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Email Address', details: [ 'info@kanoonmitra.com', 'support@kanoonmitra.com', 'legal@kanoonmitra.com' ] }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Working Hours', details: [ 'Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM', 'Saturday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sunday: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM', 'Emergency: 24/7 Support' ] } ]; const socialLinks = [ { name: 'Facebook', url: '#', icon: ( ) }, { name: 'Twitter', url: '#', icon: ( ) }, { name: 'LinkedIn', url: '#', icon: ( ) }, { name: 'Instagram', url: '#', icon: ( ) } ]; return (
{/* Header Section */}

Contact Us

Get in touch with our legal experts. We're here to help you with all your legal needs and questions.

{/* Contact Form */}

Send us a Message

{isSubmitted && (
Your message has been sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
)}
